power.title: Combat Agility
power.fluff: Your foe might think it has escaped you, but in its moment of triumph you chase it down and make it pay

powerelement.name: Trigger:
powerelement.text: An enemy adjacent to you provokes an opportunity attack

powerelement.name: Effect:
powerelement.text: You shift a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier. You must end the shift closer to the target than you were when you began the shift.
If the triggering enemy is within your reach, make a melee basic attack against it. You also knock the target prone on a hit.

powerelement.name: Special:
powerelement.text: This power counts as an opportunity attack.

power.title: Combat Superiority
power.fluff: Your eye for openings is such that enemies find it almost impossible to disengage from you

powerelement.name: Trigger:
powerelement.text: An enemy adjacent to you provokes an opportunity attack

powerelement.name: Effect:
powerelement.text: Make a melee basic attack against the target, with a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Wisdom modifier.
If a move triggered the attack, the target stops moving. If it has further actions remaining, it can use them to resume moving.

powerelement.name: Special:
powerelement.text: This power counts as an opportunity attack.

power.title: Enforce Challenge
power.fluff: It is dangerous to ignore your challenge

powerelement.name: Trigger:
powerelement.text: An enemy marked by you and within your reach either shifts or makes an attack that doesn't target you

powerelement.name: Effect:
powerelement.text: You make a melee basic attack against the target.

power.title: Feywild Enforcement
power.fluff: You teleport from one place to the next to punish an enemy that ignores you

powerelement.name: Prerequisite:
powerelement.text: You must be eladrin, and have the fey step power

powerelement.name: Trigger:
powerelement.text: An enemy marked by you and within your reach either shifts or makes an attack that doesn't target you

powerelement.name: Effect:
powerelement.text: You teleport up to 2 squares to an unoccupied square adjacent to the triggering enemy.

powerelement.name: Special:
powerelement.text: This power counts as enforce challenge for feats and abilities that require it or modify it.
